about_the_game:
Embark on an Epic Journey in a World Under Siege

About the Game

Asteria is a single-player, open-world RPG visual novel blending deep storytelling with real-time combat. 

The once-thriving world of Asteria has fallen into darkness. The Seven Deadly Sins, servants of a ruthless Demon Lord, spread chaos and destruction, pushing civilization to the brink. As a homunculus created in this era of turmoil, your choices will shape the fate of the world.

IMMERSE YOURSELF IN A UNIQUE RPG EXPERIENCE

Master real-time combat with intricate skill trees, unique abilities, and strategic power combinations tailored to your playstyle. With a vast arsenal of items, gear, companions, and summons, every battle is an opportunity to grow stronger.

LEARN FROM EVERY ENEMY

Defeat powerful foes and steal their skills, mixing and matching abilities to craft the perfect build. Experiment with different combinations to overcome any challenge that stands in your way.

EXPLORE A WORLD OF UNCERTAINTY

Venture through Asteria’s vast, unpredictable world, where random encounters can lead to fortune or peril. Every decision carries weight—will you emerge victorious or find yourself back at camp, licking your wounds?

SURVIVE AGAINST ALL ODDS

Endure the harsh realities of survival by managing hunger, thirst, and exhaustion. Navigate treacherous dungeons and Hell Gates, where preparation is the key to survival. The unprepared will not last long.

FORGE ALLIANCES & FACE LEGENDS

Meet a diverse cast of characters—some allies, some adversaries. Recruit companions, build relationships, and expand your personal pocket dimension camp. Stand against legendary bosses as you fight to free Asteria from its impending doom.

Your adventure begins now. Will you rise against the darkness and change the fate of Asteria?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7+
  • Processor: Intel I3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 900 Series or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: Not supported - yet
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7+
  • Processor: Intel I5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 10 Series or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: Not supported - yet

short_description: Asteria is a high-fantasy RPG with real-time combat and deep progression. As a homunculus, shape your story through choices that decide the fate of a world besieged by the Demon Lord and the Seven Deadly Sins. Explore, battle, and uncover multiple endings in this immersive RPG-visual novel hybrid.
